name: Challenge From Beyond
description:
You’re stuck in a house with no knowledge except for what is around you. The house does not seem normal and weird things start happening. Will you be able to discover what is going on? And will you get out?

Challenge From Beyond is an atmospheric, narrative-driven game featuring pixel-art, lit with 2D-lighting. The gameplay consist of exploring and puzzle-solving with simple Point & Click and Click & Drag mechanics.
